name: Helix Bounce !
description:
Exciting adventure of the bouncing ball through the helix tower labyrinth.

Tap to jump over obstacles, but be careful, you must have a great timing!

Collect gems to unlock stylish new characters and colorful new tower textures.

Slide down the Spiral as far as you can and get the best score in the world!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
